Sharing Faster Securing Smoother DigiBoxx lets you share your photos, files and folders on an Indian cloud, and it\'s quick, secure and easy on the pocket. DigiBoxx lets you track your digital assets with robust analytics and helps you manage your assets. DigiBoxx allows you to further secure your precious memories by employing a password-enabled \'Secure Folder\'.
